name: magicpack
tagline: A minimal web tool for organizing image and asset packs
description: Magicpack is a simple tool for managing image or asset packs through a minimal web interface. It helps developers and designers group and organize graphic resources with easy upload and search.

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Upload multiple files simultaneously to speed up asset library creation

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Apply custom tags to assets for quick filtering and categorization

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find specific assets using filename, tag, or metadata search

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export individual files or entire collections as compressed archives

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Set permissions to control who can view, upload, or modify asset packs

features.title: Metadata Editing
features.description: Add descriptions, keywords, and custom fields to assets for better organization
